text: Lalín is a city in Galicia, Spain. It is in the northern part of the province of Pontevedra. Lalín is the capital of the region of Deza. In 2014, there were 20,103 people living in the city. ==References== ==Other websites== *Concello de Lalín Category:Capital cities in Spain Category:Province of Pontevedra Category:Municipalities in Galicia
title: Lalín
